CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 29, 1952, pg. 28 reads: "On To Philadelphia! - Farrell High School's crack basketball squad, paced by the brilliant Julius McCoy's 24 points, nipped a fighting Westinghouse High School outfit at the Pitt Field House Wednesday night, 54-53, and thereby earned the right to meet Coatsville High School's quintet for the state championship at Philadelphia Saturday night. It will be Farrell's second straight appearance in state final."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Farrell High School coach, and basketball players, possibly including Julius McCoy, posed in interior
